last_episode_to_air.name: Paranoid Android
last_episode_to_air.overview: When a shooter on the loose triggers a flashback that doesn't add up with Carrie's perfect memory, the team at Major Crimes discovers that a nefarious conspiracy is at play and trained killers are among them.

name: Unforgettable
overview: Former Syracuse, New York, police detective Carrie Wells has hyperthymesia, a rare medical condition that gives her the ability to visually remember everything. She reluctantly joins the New York City Police Department's Queens homicide unit after her former boyfriend and partner asks for help with solving a case. The move allows her to try to find out the one thing she has been unable to remember, which is what happened the day her sister was murdered.
tagline: She can do anything but forget.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: A murder reunites former detective Carrie Wells with her ex-boyfriend and colleague; Carrie must use her rare ability to help solve the case.

episodes.name: Heroes
episodes.overview: Carrie must put aside memories of her sister's death to help a young murder witness lead the police to a killer.

episodes.name: Check Out Time
episodes.overview: Carrie tries to uncover the truth when a hotel maid accused of murder says she was defending herself against attempted rape.

episodes.name: Up in Flames
episodes.overview: After an explosion destroys a crime scene, Carrie's memories become essential to the investigation.

episodes.name: With Honor
episodes.overview: When Al’s ex-partner is gunned down and the investigation reveals he may have been a dirty cop, Carrie must decide how to support him without getting too close

episodes.name: Friended
episodes.overview: Carrie and Al’s investigation into the murder of a hard-partying heiress takes an unexpected turn when they discover that the woman apparently didn’t exist until 18 months earlier.

episodes.name: Road Block
episodes.overview: Carrie's investigation into the death of her sister moves forward, but her inability to let go may hinder the search for a missing infant whose father was murdered.

episodes.name: Lost Things
episodes.overview: Carrie and Al investigate the death of a public defender, only to discover that the killer has a larger plan which may lead to a second murder.

episodes.name: Golden Bird
episodes.overview: Al and Carrie investigate the murder of a teen who seemed to have no enemies. Meanwhile, Carrie looks to her estranged aunt for help with the investigation into her sister's murder.

episodes.name: Trajectories
episodes.overview: When a second murder suddenly occurs at an active crime scene, Al and Carrie must wade through hundreds of bystanders to uncover if it was retribution or an unrelated attack.

episodes.name: Spirited Away
episodes.overview: A renowned ghost hunter is killed and the investigation reveals that his death is linked to a chilling discovery he made while on a recent assignment.

episodes.name: Butterfly Effect
episodes.overview: When a construction worker with a promising future is murdered, Carrie and Al wonder if his ties to the mob were the cause of his death or an unrelated coincidence.

episodes.name: Brotherhood
episodes.overview: A routine investigation into a college student’s death takes a disturbing turn for Carrie when a suspect makes a dangerous move to outwit her memory.

episodes.name: Carrie's Caller
episodes.overview: A serial killer with knowledge of Carrie’s memory abilities taunts the Queens PD as his list of victims grows.

episodes.name: The Following Sea
episodes.overview: When a key witness in his murder case vanishes before testifying, Al scrambles to find her before the suspect walks free.

episodes.name: Heartbreak
episodes.overview: Carrie and Al are at a loss to explain how a murder victim mysteriously appeared in an empty ballpark.

episodes.name: Blind Alleys
episodes.overview: Al and Carrie are forced to the sidelines by a negotiator when the father of a suspect that Roe shot takes members of the Queens PD, including Nina, hostage in a desperate quest for justice.

episodes.name: The Comeback
episodes.overview: When Carrie’s latest case is stalled by a powerful family’s influence, she receives assistance from a lawyer who may be the mysterious caller who orchestrated a series of sniper attacks.

episodes.name: Allegiances
episodes.overview: Carrie’s personal and professional lives collide when her boyfriend, the son of a mob boss, is revealed to have ties to suspects in a murder investigation.

episodes.name: You Are Here
episodes.overview: Carrie and Al must get inside the mind of a deranged conspiracy theorist before he sets off a series of bombs.

episodes.name: Endgame
episodes.overview: When Carrie's obsessed admirer turns up dead, she must locate the killer while deflecting attention from the prime suspect: her.

episodes.name: The Man in the Woods
episodes.overview: Carrie follows the trail of her sister's killer to Syracuse, where the murderer may have struck again.

episodes.name: Bigtime
episodes.overview: Carrie and Al’s reputation for closing cases results in an offer to join the Major Crimes Section of the NYPD.  But when their first case – a high-profile child kidnapping – hits close to home for Carrie, it leaves her wondering if a move from Queens to Manhattan is what’s best for her.

episodes.name: Incognito
episodes.overview: Carrie goes undercover with a team of bank robbers when The Major Crimes Section gets a lead on the gang’s leader, a notorious thief who rarely shows his face.

episodes.name: Day of the Jackie
episodes.overview: Carrie and Al are unable to discern why a businessman was murdered in his hotel room until it’s discovered that his death was collateral damage in a larger plot to assassinate a diplomat.

episodes.name: Memory Kings
episodes.overview: When the scientist who helped Carrie understand her memory abilities is murdered, she must track down other people with the same skill in the hopes that one of them holds the key to finding the killer.

episodes.name: Past Tense
episodes.overview: Carrie and Al’s latest case – the murder of an Afghani cab driver – has the potential to turn into a matter of national security when it’s discovered that the victim was a government informant.

episodes.name: Line Up or Shut Up
episodes.overview: When a young man is found dead in an expensive sports car he was delivering to a diplomat, each clue leads Carrie and Al to yet another possible motive for the murder.

episodes.name: Maps & Legends
episodes.overview: The murder of an urban explorer leads Carrie and Al to not only search for the killer, but to pick up the trail of clues the victim was following on the hunt for a treasure supposedly hidden under the streets of New York.

episodes.name: Till Death
episodes.overview: After a wealthy couple is murdered, Carrie and Al pose as a married couple to lure in the killer, who Al believes is linked to a series of unsolved homicides he once investigated.

episodes.name: Flesh and Blood
episodes.overview: Carrie catches a deadly assassin who has eluded her before, but must put her personal vendetta aside when it’s revealed that the woman has vital information to prevent a terrorist attack on New York City.

episodes.name: Manhunt
episodes.overview: The murder of a prominent lawyer leads Carrie and Al to reexamine a rape case that moved Manhattan thirteen years before. Soon, they realize that the case was not as clear cut as it was portrayed by the media, and an innocent man may have been wrongfully convicted.

episodes.name: East of Islip
episodes.overview: A murdered body washes ashore in the Hamptons, and Carrie and Al's boss offers them a "paid vacation" in his beautiful Southampton cottage, in order to help local law enforcement find the killer, who may or may not be related to a previous serial killer.

episodes.name: Omega Hour
episodes.overview: When Carrie and Elliott are attending a party sponsored by the mayor, a group of criminals seizes control of the building, and demand a hefty ransom. It is up to Carrie to thwart their plans by playing from the Die Hard book.

episodes.name: Reunion
episodes.overview: Carrie's high school reunion is suddenly cut short when an alum shows up dead. Carrie has to remember back 22 years to understand the events that led to this crime.

episodes.name: New Hundred
episodes.overview: Carrie and Al assist the Secret Service with a murder investigation that has ties to a counterfeiting ring run by an assassin.

episodes.name: The Combination
episodes.overview: Carrie and Al investigate when a championship boxer appears to have been beaten to death without making an effort to defend himself.

episodes.name: The Haircut
episodes.overview: After releasing a salacious story about the director of the NSA, a reporter is murdered; Agent Simms comes back to help Carrie; Al reconnects with an ex who might be able to assist with the case.

episodes.name: Cashing Out
episodes.overview: When Carrie recognizes a murdered city official as someone she played poker with at an underground casino, she puts her career on the line by admitting her illegal activities and volunteers to go back to the tables undercover.

episodes.name: A Moveable Feast
episodes.overview: Carrie and Al must find the connection between a murdered coast guard officer, a celebrity chef who threw him out of his restaurant and a missing block of C-4 before the explosives are used.

episodes.name: Stray Bullet
episodes.overview: Carrie conducts an investigation off the books when Al becomes the prime suspect in the murder of a parolee he helped put away.

episodes.name: Throwing Shade
episodes.overview: When one of Eliot's oldest friends, the campaign manager for a mayoral candidate, is murdered, he is forced to face his past and current demons as Carrie and Al work to uncover the killer.

episodes.name: The Island
episodes.overview: Carrie and Al's investigation into the death of a college dropout takes a surprising turn when they discover he had been living in an off-the-grid community on an abandoned island near Manhattan.

episodes.name: Admissions
episodes.overview: Carrie and Al dig into the secrets of students and faculty at an elite prep school when a high-powered CEO and father of one of the students is murdered.

episodes.name: Fire and Ice
episodes.overview: When Homeland Security takes over a bombing investigation from Major Crimes, Carrie doubts their conclusion that it's tied to terrorism and secretly continues her own investigation. Meanwhile, Webster makes friends with Murray's daughter.

episodes.name: True Identity
episodes.overview: Carrie and Al investigate the murder of a high-end matchmaking service employee, but each secret they uncover in the victim's life only serves to create a new possible suspect and motive.

episodes.name: Moving On
episodes.overview: Carrie and Al delve into the disturbing - and dangerous - world of celebrity obsession when a television star is found murdered in his dressing room.

episodes.name: D.O.A.
episodes.overview: Carrie is unable to utilize her perfect memory when an assassin doses her with a deadly poison that attacks her brain, leaving Al on a desperate hunt for the antidote.

episodes.name: Blast From the Past
episodes.overview: Eddie Martin, Carrie's long-lost husband, pays a visit to Major Crimes while investigating a meth crew that is involved in something more nefarious than dealing drugs.

episodes.name: Gut Check
episodes.overview: Carrie and Al are assigned to transport the star witness in a high profile securities fraud case to Miami, while attempting to evade the killers on their trail.

episodes.name: Behind the Beat
episodes.overview: The killing of a young jazz prodigy leads Carrie and the team into the halls of a competitive music conservatory and the underbelly of the city's jazz club scene.

episodes.name: Dollars and Scents
episodes.overview: The Major Crimes team learn that a deli employee's murder is linked to a foreign criminal organization that has the ability to cripple the world's financial markets.

episodes.name: All In
episodes.overview: Things heat up for Carrie when an old flame and a murder investigation lead the Major Crimes team to Atlantic City, NJ.

episodes.name: The Return of Eddie
episodes.overview: Carrie and Al suspect that a cameraman's death during a convenience store robbery may be more than a random act of violence.

episodes.name: We Can Be Heroes
episodes.overview: Major Crimes determines that the kidnapping of a prominent scientist's son was not a crime of opportunity but rather a calculated scheme for revenge.

episodes.name: Breathing Space
episodes.overview: Suspects are plentiful in a case of a murdered aerospace engineer, the Major Crimes team learns that the victim was working on a billionaire's top secret space mission.

episodes.name: Shelter From the Storm
episodes.overview: Carrie, Al and a captured criminal hole up in an abandoned precinct as a sinister storm approaches, with their captive's violent crew hot on their tail.

episodes.name: Game On
episodes.overview: Carrie and Al investigate the world of high-stakes video games and corporate espionage after a man is found dead inside a haunted-house attraction.

episodes.name: About Face
episodes.overview: Carrie and Al receive new information in the cold case of a missing surgeon, putting them on the trail of two con artists.

episodes.name: Bad Company
episodes.overview: Capt. Russo is suspected in the murder of an informant, leading Carrie and Al into a cat-and-mouse game with a corrupt former cop.

episodes.name: Paranoid Android
episodes.overview: When a shooter on the loose triggers a flashback that doesn't add up with Carrie's perfect memory, the team at Major Crimes discovers that a nefarious conspiracy is at play and trained killers are among them.
